text: Panayiotis (Takis) Biniaris (Athens, 9 June 1955) is a Greek singer who represented his country in the Eurovision Song Contest 1985, in which he sang Miazoume. He earned 15 points and finished in 16th place. Biniaris also participated in the Greek national selection for Eurovision in 1991 with the song Opou ke na’ssai which was unplaced. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century Greek singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants of 1985 Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants for Greece Category:Greek male singers Category:Greek pop singers Category:Singers from Athens Category:20th-century male singers
title: Takis Biniaris
